name: Knight By Night
description:
Knight by Night is a 2D Visual Novel / Adventure game where you play as Ashling, an aspiring knight with the ability to traverse the other's dreams. Ashling finds themselves in the small town of Albtraum, where its townsfolk are riddled with problems. Help the citizens of Albtraum by getting to know their personalities during the day, then entering their dreams to fight their fears... literally!
